Hello, I'm Melissa Yates. I'm a full-stack web developer.


Who am I?
I am a Web Developer currently learning and improving my front-end and back-end programming skills.
From Biology, to Public Health, to Advanced EMT - I am constantly strive for new opportunities and challenges that are meaningful to me which has resulted in my current path.
As a web developer, my aim is to create user friendly websites and mobile applications that are meaningful and meticulously crafted.
I am eager to learn new technologies and processes to transform great ideas into polished efficient results.
